ygData.subject: NPCs selling lambent stones (was Lambent Stones on E'ci)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I learned something new today.  I was always under the impression that lambent stones could only be acquired by killing a giant or griffon.  Never knew
ygData.messageBody:
Well I learned something new today. I was always under the impression that
lambent stones could only be acquired by killing a giant or griffon. Never
knew you could buy them from NPCs. Can someone list the known locations
where NPCs sell them?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci


> Another thing. I was wanting a stone the other night for my last piece of
> Lambent. The zone was camped and I couldn't find ONE giant, much less
> two.
> I /auc'd for a stone and some jackass wanted 100pp. I said "Hey guy, I
> can
> buy one from the INN in Rathe Mts., a 60 second run, for 48pp." He called
> me a liar of course, so I ran to the Inn and bought it for 48pp.
